abstract.para: Brake the currently selected motors so that they stop turning immediately rather freewheel to a halt.
Motors are selected using the motors instruction.

sect2.title: Example
sect2.programlisting: ... uint8 0b11 ; Binary value selecting the first two motors motors ; Flag the above motors as being selected thatway ; selected motors in 'that' direction uint8 255 setpower ; selected motors to full power on ; selected motors on uint16 1000 ; wait 1 second wait off ; selected motors off thisway ; selected motors in 'this' direction on ; selected motors on again ; Reverse motor 1 only uint8 0b01 motors ; Only motor 1 is selected now (both motors still on) off ; turn off motor 1 rd ; reverse direction of motor 1 on ; motor 1 back on (now turning the opposite direction to motor 2) uint16 1000 ; wait 1 second wait uint8 0b11 ; select both motors again motors off brake ; brake both motors ...
